DOC.brief_summary: Obesity major US public health problem . Few obesity prevention program reduce risk weight gain follow-up intensive , make dissemination difficult costly . A brief 3-hr selective prevention program ( Healthy Weight ) target young adult body dissatisfaction involve participant-driven healthy dietary physical activity lifestyle change significantly reduce increase body mass index ( BMI ) obesity onset relative alternative intervention assessment-only control 3-yr follow-up , though effect small magnitude . To enhance efficacy , investigator add dissonance-inducing activity regard unhealthy dietary activity practice , draw highly efficacious dissonance-based eat disorder prevention program . A pilot trial find new Project Health intervention significantly reduce increase BMI relative Healthy Weight intervention educational brochure condition pre post . The investigator propose conduct rigorous multisite effectiveness trial test whether add dissonance-induction element originally Healthy Weight intervention improves weight gain prevention effect . 360 college student risk future weight virtue age weight concern randomize one three condition : ( 1 ) refine 6-hr group-based dissonance-based Project Health , ( 2 ) 6-hr group-based Healthy Weight intervention , ( 3 ) psychoeducational video ( `` Weight World '' ) condition . Participants complete assessment % body fat , mediator ( include objectively measure physical activity ) , moderator , outcome pre , post , 6 , 12 , 24 month follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Trial Dissonance-Based Obesity Prevention Program
DOC.detailed_description: Aim 1 test hypothesis Project Health significantly reduce increase % body fat relative Healthy Weight intervention video control condition 2-yr follow-up ; secondary outcome BMI , depressive symptom eat disorder symptom . The investigator also compare Healthy Weight video control . Aim 2 test hypothesis Project Health participant experience increase cognitive dissonance ( uncomfortable psychological state ) regard eat unhealthy food engage sedentary behavior , change dissonance mediate program 's weight gain prevention effect . The investigator also test whether reduce calorie intake increase physical activity mediate effect Project Health change % body fat . Aim 3 test hypothesis intervention effect amplify participant elevate body dissatisfaction ( increase motivation change ) preference consistency ( maximize dissonance induction ) mitigate participant report emotional eat substance use ( factor increase risk overeat ) .
DOC.criteria: University student Presents selfreported `` weight concern '' Diagnosis Eating Disorder Obese Underweight Nonenglish speaking
